name: Escpae The Cops
description:
Escape The Cops is a car driving game in which the cops are after you and you need to escape and reach the garage at the end.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys or The Movement Stick on the controller (I forgot which side stick is used for movement) to move

E or Triangle or the top side button (search triangle button on ps4 controller) to change the camera

Tools Used:

Unity 2019.4.16f1

Blender 2.91

The save feature doesn't work in browser so please download standalone version

BTW in the login screen if you type a new username and hit confirm a confirm password field will pop up too

Assets used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/low-poly-police-car-pack-...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/simple-cars-pack-97669

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...
